data.title: EMC Corporation, dba System Peripherals, Inc.
data.text:
Contract Number

EMC, Corp. offers Data Storage, Data Communication & Networking Equipment and Related Services through this contract. This contract offers EMC products and related services. Contracts may be used by state and local government, public education, other public entities in Texas, as well as public entities outside the state. Resellers are available on this contract. DIR has extended this Contract through 3/16/2025.
